snippet.title: eXtinction (2003) - PC Gameplay / Win 10
snippet.description:
eXtinction (2003) - PC Gameplay / Win 10

Subscribe here ►►► http://www.youtube.com/subscription_center?add_user=FirstPlaysHD
Also SHARE, COMMENT, LIKE ☺

In this arcade-styled action game, players advance through 30 levels and defeat six savage bosses as special agent Nick Naster, a space pilot who has had top training in a multitude of modern weaponry. Naster loses his family to an alien virus known as Zeta 2, which mutates humans, and thus volunteers for the eXtinction mission. He must now wipe out all vestiges of the plague with the help of nine weapons including a chaingun, magma cannon, missile launcher and photon thrower. Features 30 game levels and six distinct zones, a variety of music provided by 17 soundtracks, six intimidating bosses and numerous enemies, nine exciting weapons for strategic combat, as well as detailed animations, advanced particle and lighting effects. 



░▒▓ PC Hardware ▓▒░

CPU: Intel Core i7 3770K @ 4.20 Ghz
RAM: 16 GB
GPU: Nvidia Geforce GTX 970
OS:  Windows 10 64bit


░▒▓ Recording HW/SW ▓▒░

Nvidia Shadowplay
